Package org.saidone.service

package org.saidone.service
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.saidone
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractCryptoService
    Abstract base class implementing cryptographic operations using different key derivation functions Extends BaseComponent for lifecycle management and implements CryptoService interface Supports PBKDF2, HKDF and Argon2 key derivation functions Contains inner configuration classes for each KDF type with validation constraints
    AbstractCryptoService.Kdf
    Configuration class for key derivation function settings Contains nested configuration classes for PBKDF2, HKDF and Argon2
    AbstractCryptoService.Kdf.Argon2
    Configuration for Argon2 key derivation function
    AbstractCryptoService.Kdf.Hkdf
    Configuration for HKDF key derivation function
    AbstractCryptoService.Kdf.Pbkdf2
    Configuration for PBKDF2 key derivation function
    AlfrescoService
    Service class for interacting with Alfresco repository nodes and content.
    AuthenticationService
     
    BcCryptoServiceImpl
    Implements symmetric encryption/decryption using ChaCha20-Poly1305 via the Bouncy Castle provider.
    CryptoService
     
    JcaCryptoServiceImpl
    Implements symmetric encryption/decryption using AES-GCM mode via Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA).
    SecretService
    Service class for interacting with Vault to retrieve secrets.
    VaultService
    Service responsible for archiving, restoring, and managing nodes in the vault.
